GP Tech Paramedic Students Participate in Mass Casualty Exercises

GP Tech Blog - by M. Churchwell

In Linda Pledger’s paramedic program at GP Tech, students aren't just learning from textbooks; they're immersing themselves in real-world scenarios to hone their skills and readiness for any situation. Recently, students participated in a mass casualty incident (MCI) training day that included ...

Firefighter/EMT & Criminal Justice

GP Tech Blog - by M. Churchwell

In celebration of Women’s History Month, we interviewed several women enrolled in Great Plains Technology Center’s trade programs where they are crafting their own narratives of success while gaining real-world skills and exploring careers that many still consider male-dominated.
